short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sentiment analysis tool for your twitter timeline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sentiment analysis tool for the twitter time line. It displays a dot which indicates sentiment on each tweet. The analysis is completed using a machine learning model so it may not be 100% accurate. Currently it is a proof of concept more than anything. On hover there is a nice animation displaying text of the tweet for those who cannot see colour. This is a product of my A level course work.
